Entry.name: A
Entry.value: Case Turned Over to a Consultant

Entry.name: C
Entry.value: X-ray or Lab Procedure Related to a Covered Surgery

Entry.name: D
Entry.value: Provider/Supplier determined the service is not covered, but the patient is requesting a formal review by the payor

Entry.name: E
Entry.value: Beneficiary was notified that the item might not be considered medically necessary and has agreed in writing to pay for the item; A signed waiver is on file with the provider

Entry.name: F
Entry.value: Beneficiary was notified that the item might not be considered medically necessary and has not agreed to pay for the item; No signed waiver is on file with the provider
